body_html:
One of the outputs of SoftmaxCrossEntropyWithLogits is the gradient, so the gradient wrt this second output will be the second derivative.
…
On Tue, Feb 21, 2017 at 9:16 AM, Dmitry Persiyanov ***@***.*** > wrote: I can't do this because SoftmaxCrossentropyWithLogitsGrad must return first derivatives w.r.t logits and labels, not second ones. Or there is something that I missed and that is why I seem stupid:) — You are receiving this because you were mentioned. body:
One of the outputs of SoftmaxCrossEntropyWithLogits is the gradient, so the
gradient wrt this second output will be the second derivative.

On Tue, Feb 21, 2017 at 9:16 AM, Dmitry Persiyanov <notifications@github.com
> wrote:

> I can't do this because SoftmaxCrossentropyWithLogitsGrad must return
> first derivatives w.r.t logits and labels, not second ones. Or there is
> something that I missed and that is why I seem stupid:)
